title: hacking incidents
extract: Hacking generally refers to unauthorized intrusion into a computer or a network. The person engaged in hacking activities is known as a hacker. ... Hacking can also refer to non-malicious activities, usually involving unusual or improvised alterations to equipment or processes.
extract_html: Hacking generally refers to unauthorized intrusion into a computer or a network. The person engaged in hacking activities is known as a hacker. ... Hacking can also refer to non-malicious activities, usually involving unusual or improvised alterations to equipment or processes.
